mapper.select: select relname as table_name, cast(obj_description(relfilenode,'pg_class') as varchar) as table_comment from pg_class c where relkind = 'r' and relname not like 'pg_%' and relname not like 'sql_%' order by relname

select relname as table_name,cast(obj_description(relfilenode,'pg_class') as varchar) as table_comment from pg_class c where relkind = 'r' and relname not like 'pg_%' and relname not like 'sql_%' and relname = #{tableName}

select a.attname as column_name, pg_type.typname as column_type, col_description(a.attrelid,a.attnum) as column_comment, a.attnotnull as is_null from pg_class as c, pg_attribute as a inner join pg_type on pg_type.oid = a.atttypid left join pg_constraint t3 on a.attnum = t3.conkey[1] and a.attrelid = t3.conrelid where c.relname = #{tableName} and a.attrelid = c.oid and a.attnum>0
